benchmark_details.name: AVALON BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: AVALON BENCH is a comprehensive game environment tailored for evaluating multi-agent LLM Agents in the strategic social deduction game Resistance Avalon. It includes a game environment, rule-based bots as baseline opponents, and ReAct-style LLM agents with tailored prompts for each role.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate multi-agent LLM Agents in the context of the social deduction game Resistance Avalon.

data.source: Game interactions between LLM agents and rule-based bots.

methodology.calculation: Win rates are calculated based on the outcomes of games played by LLM agents against deterministic rule-based bots.
methodology.interpretation: A higher win rate indicates better performance and strategic capabilities of the LLM agents in the game.
methodology.baseline_results: Baseline results indicate that LLM agents like ChatGPT achieved a win rate of 22.2% in good-role and 66.7% in evil-role against naive bots.
methodology.validation: Evaluations based on game outcomes and decision-making capabilities observed during game play.
